channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8219083] java/net/MulticastSocket/SetGetNetworkInterfaceTest.java failed in same binary run on windows x64
item.description:
This failure observed in jdk-13+8 same binary persistently, reproducible, on windows x64

----------System.err:(30/2350)----------
java.lang.RuntimeException: Test Fail
at SetGetNetworkInterfaceTest.setGetNetworkInterface(SetGetNetworkInterfaceTest.java:63)
at SetGetNetworkInterfaceTest.lambda$main$0(SetGetNetworkInterfaceTest.java:46)
at java.base/java.util.stream.ForEachOps$ForEachOp$OfRef.accept(ForEachOps.java:183)
at java.base/java.util.stream.DistinctOps$1$2.accept(DistinctOps.java:174)
at java.base/java.util.stream.ReferencePipeline$2$1.accept(ReferencePipeline.java:177)
at java.base/java.util.stream.ReferencePipeline$2$1.accept(ReferencePipeline.java:177)
at java.base/java.util.stream.ReferencePipeline$2$1.accept(ReferencePipeline.java:177)
at java.base/java.util.HashMap$KeySpliterator.forEachRemaining(HashMap.java:1605)
at java.base/java.util.stream.AbstractPipeline.copyInto(AbstractPipeline.java:484)
at java.base/java.util.stream.AbstractPipeline.wrapAndCopyInto(AbstractPipeline.java:474)
at java.base/java.util.stream.StreamSpliterators$WrappingSpliterator.forEachRemaining(StreamSpliterators.java:312)
at java.base/java.util.stream.Streams$ConcatSpliterator.forEachRemaining(Streams.java:734)
at java.base/java.util.stream.AbstractPipeline.copyInto(AbstractPipeline.java:484)
at java.base/java.util.stream.AbstractPipeline.wrapAndCopyInto(AbstractPipeline.java:474)
at java.base/java.util.stream.ForEachOps$ForEachOp.evaluateSequential(ForEachOps.java:150)
at java.base/java.util.stream.ForEachOps$ForEachOp$OfRef.evaluateSequential(ForEachOps.java:173)
at java.base/java.util.stream.AbstractPipeline.evaluate(AbstractPipeline.java:234)
at java.base/java.util.stream.ReferencePipeline.forEach(ReferencePipeline.java:497)
at SetGetNetworkInterfaceTest.main(SetGetNetworkInterfaceTest.java:46)
at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:567)
at com.sun.javatest.regtest.agent.MainActionHelper$AgentVMRunnable.run(MainActionHelper.java:246)
at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:835)

JavaTest Message: Test threw exception: java.lang.RuntimeException
JavaTest Message: shutting down test
item.summary: java/net/MulticastSocket/SetGetNetworkInterfaceTest.java failed in same binary run on windows x64

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Changeset: 147f3473
Author: Daniel Jeliński <djelinski@openjdk.org>
Date: 2023-03-23 15:45:14 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/147f3473d4cb6e0bb9edda87d571ba5088fda4a2

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/13142
Date: 2023-03-22 15:07:21 +0000

The issue was caused by a bad interaction between TwoStackPlainDatagramSocket and the loopback interface, which was listed as IPv4-only. SetOption configured the loopback interface for IPv4 multicasting only, and getOption returned the interface that was configured for IPv6 multicasting in an earlier setOption call.

TwoStackPlainDatagramSocket is now gone, and the current setOption implementation either sets the selected interface for IPv6 multicasting or fails. This test can be un-problemlisted in JDK21.
